feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets beginning before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023
